snippet: Oneida's new owner, Monomoy Capital Partners, is helping the company rise from the aftermath of bankruptcy, and expansion is now the goal.
abstract: Oneida's new owner, Monomoy Capital Partners, is helping the company rise from the aftermath of bankruptcy, and expansion is now the goal.
lead_paragraph: ONEIDA, N.Y. - Some local residents, when eating out, instinctively turn their utensils upside-down to look for a telltale sign: the word "Oneida," stamped into the back of the handle.

headline.main: Private Equity Firm Sees a Future in Flatware
